short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block Blast Cheat helps you solve Block Blast puzzles by analyzing the screenshot of the puzzle.

Compatible with iOS, Android, and tablets, it requires no downloadsâ€”just upload a clear, unedited screenshot and get instant results.
